## checkCredentials() function

Checks credentials for common user mistakes of copying {<!-- -->, }<!-- -->, or " characters from the documentation

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function checkCredentials(obj: any, credsToCheck: string[]): Error | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  obj | any | The options object holding credentials |
|  credsToCheck | string\[\] | An array containing the keys of the credentials to check for problems |

<b>Returns:</b>

Error \| null

{<!-- -->string \| null<!-- -->} - Returns a string with the error message if there were problems, null if not
